You're on a soccer field with a team of ten-year-old boys
You're in a laboratory of some kind with a 11-year-old Asian boy

You're in your home, but things seem a lot bigger
1.content:
You're a seventeen-year-old guy, tall, athletic and good looking, with a nice muscular build, tan skin and long blonde hair. It's the beginning of your senior year of high school, and you have it made; everything always seems to go your way. You have no problem asserting your size over your dorky twelve-year-old brother Alex, even if it seems like bullying at times.

One warm-night you go to sleep in your bed, as normal, after a long day. A short while later, you bolt up with a start. Looking around, you realize that you're not in your bed, and also you're not alone! In fact, it seems like...
1.title: Phantasms

choices: ...is normal. Must've just been your eyes tricking you.
...has a great tan, you forgot how much he's been working on it.
...is looking buff, REALLY buff. Even more than you.
...is at eye-level...no...maybe even taller than you are.
...is fine, but another boy isn't exactly small nearby.
11.content:
"C'mon bro. Wake up!"

You mumble and grunt, then sit up, a bit groggy, and in darkness. Suddenly the darkness is bright light and you shield your eyes.

"Took you long enough! You said you'd take me to the snack bar!"

You take it easy for a minute, wondering where you are, and why Alex's voice is talking about a snack bar and such. Slowly your eyes adjust to the light of the beach, and you understand that you're on the beach, but you don't remember coming here. You figure you were dreaming about your house, which is why you feel so confused.

You look over at Alex, who's fairly annoyed, not that you really care if you bug him a bit. He usually annoys you at home, so it's fair-game that you do a bit to him as well.

"Yeah...sure...snack bar, Alex. Let's go"
"Finally." He replies in turn, rolling his eyes.

You stand up, Alex beside you as you lead him to the snack bar. As you both walk, eyes, mostly from the girls, on the beach seem to gravitate to you. Not that you mind, that's why you like the beach, you worked hard for your bod, so why not let others enjoy you as well? Nothing serious would come from it, but it was fun.

"Sheesh, if I knew you were gonna stop to show off as well, I would've been home at this rate." Alex says, just wanting you to hurry up.

In turn, you glare at him, only to be shocked. Alex...
11.title: Beachy brother

choices: Alex, but as he eats, he is growing!
Someone or something else catches your attention.
That you're no longer on the beach at all.
111.content:
You shake your head, ignoring Alex. You thought he looked different, but you must've still been feeling groggy or something, because he's the same annoying pest you know him to be, and not changed at all.

"There, we're at the snack bar." you say to him, going to get in line. You get no reply, because Alex has already walked off to get into the line.

Even so, you can't help but feel like something is off here, something ISN'T right. You really just hope it would be something big, huge and obvious, but there's nothing, which only sends another chill down your spine.

People push by you, making you get out of their way, so you step off to the side, trying to relax and clear your head.

"Let's just make a check list...I'm Justin...check. I have 2 hands, and 2 feet...check. I have..." you flex an arm, feeling it a bit "...muscles, check. Alright, I'm all here. I have an annoying brother, check. I have two parents, check. So far so good." Even so, there's a little voice in the back of your head, warning that something is still missing or wrong.

You decide to step into the snack bar, but as you do, you're surprised to see...
111.title: Normal brother, not so normal beach.

choices: Alex grows another foot taller while you rub lotion on him
Alex's muscles inflate even more while you rub lotion on his body
1111.content:
You finally get behind your little brother in line at the snack bar. When it's almost his turn, he turns around to face you. You know exactly what he's gonna ask for, because he has no money.

"A Snickers bar is seventy-five cents! Do you have three quarters?" he asks me.

"Sure..." you sigh, as you dig into your small plastic pouch which is strapped around your waist. You pull out the pouch but you give him a Dollar and two quarters instead. "Please buy me one as well."

You give him a buck fifty and then you step out of the line and you wait for him.

A minute later your little brother comes walking up to you, holding two chocolate bars in his hands.

"Justin! Here's your Snickers bar!" he says as he hands you your snack. "Thanks! I was so hungry!"

"Now, Remember Alex..." You say to him as you both tear the wrapper from your chocolate bars before you begin to eat. "You gotta wait twenty minutes before you get into the water. Otherwise you'll get stomach cramps and you'll throw up!"

"Don't worry..." Alex says between bites, "I'll build a... A sand castle... or something..."

As I looked at him while he was eating his Snickers bar, I began to notice something about him while we were walking back to the spot where we had our lounge chairs in the sand. With every bite he took, it seemed like Alex was growing bigger and taller!

Alex had taken one bit out of his chocolate bar, and he seemed to be three inches taller already! His shoulders seemed broader, his abdominal muscles were more defined, and his biceps bulged a little more.

When he took his second bite, his calves somehow grew larger, his legs appeared longer, and his pectorals bulged a bit more.

After his third bite, he grew another three inches, his shoulders widened even more, and his quads grew thicker.

Finally, after he had finished his snack, Alex had gained over a foot in height, over twenty pounds in muscle, his torso had widened, his shoulders were bigger and his legs, his arms and his chest were far more muscular than they were just a few minutes before.

"Justin? Can we stay here till tonight?" he asked me as he stood right in front of me.

My jaw dropped wide open as it dawned on me that I was actually looking UP to my little brother, who, at little over six feet tall, wasn't that little anymore. In fact, he was TALLER than me!

"S-sure, Alex... But, don't get sunburned, okay?"

"Oh! Mom gave me a bottle of lotion! Can you rub it on me?" he said, as he handed me a bottle of suntan lotion out of the big beach bag.

"Yeah... I see that I got a lot of skin to cover..." I sighed, as I examined him from head to toe...
1111.title: Alex, but as he eats, he is growing!

choices: Any stimulation or nourishment grows Alex?
Maybe it's the lotion?
11112.content:
Even though you were bewildered by the fact that your little brother had just grown into a tall muscular stud, you couldn't figure out how to ask him about it...which was weird, because on any other day you would have been yelling and go crazy, but today you just simply accepted it. You were still stunned and surprised, but you can't seem to make something big deal out of it.

"Hey bro?" Alex snapped you out of your thoughts. "Are you going to put some lotion on me or not? I'd do it myself, but my muscles get in the way or reaching all those tough spots."

Geez, was Alex really that musclebound? Instead of freaking, you took the bottle of lotion and squirted some into your hand. "Okay Alex, turn around so I can get your back." You told him.

Obediently your brother turned around, exposing his broad muscular back to you. You were amazed at how defined and muscular his back had gotten, but shrugged it off as you began to rub lotion on it. Looking at it was mind blowing enough, but touching Alex made you realize that those muscles were real. Alex's body was firm to the touch, with a bit of warmth. Privately you had hoped this was some sort of weird dream or that Alex was actually some sort of robot, but it all felt too real.

As you rub lotion on his back, you suddenly noticed you seemed to be using the lotion up a lot faster than you should. As you looked at Alex's back, you frowned. Was Alex....growing again?

The back, as broad as it was before, seemed even broader now. Firm muscles were visible under his skin, and his light tan only accentuated it. His shoulders were capped with some sizable traps and deltoids, and his lats spread outwards.

"Why'd you stop?" Alex asked.

"Oh, uh, just thinking about how big you've gotten." You said out loud.

Alex gave a short laugh. "Yea, and I'm still a growing boy!"

That was the understatement of the century. Privately you wondered how Alex could be growing. He wasn't eating anything right now. "Alex, can you turn around so I can get your front?"

"Sure thing bro." Alex did as he was told. As you looked at his front, you couldn't help but be stunned by how big and developed he was. His chest stuck out and his abs were really defined, and his arms and legs had a definite thickness to it. Once again you recovered quickly and returned to the task at hand. You begin to rub lotion on his arms. As you did, you could feel the bicep and triceps swell underneath the palm of your hands, pushing them apart so you could no longer reach around them, even with both hands on it! The forearms thickened and swelled, cords of muscles forming under his skin. When you applied the lotion to the other arm, the same changes occurred until he had two very big, very powerful looking arms.

Next you moved onto his torso. Like his back and arms, as soon as you put the lotion on his chest they began to visibly swell before your eyes. The more lotion you rubbed on, the bigger and fuller they became, pushing back at you. When your hands brushed his nipples, Alex breathed in sharply, causing his chest to jump out in size. "Sorry, a little sensitive." Alex chuckled. Your hands moved down to his abs, and as your fingers traced the outline, they became deeper, more shredded.

Finally you got to his legs. When you applied the lotion on his thighs, the quads grew bigger and fuller, soon filling up his swim trunks. His calves also inflated bigger, becoming the size of softballs and looked like they could swim for hours on end.

Finally finished applying the lotion on your brother, you stepped back to get a good look at what you've done. Alex had retained his height from his last growth spurt, but his body had still gotten a whole lot bigger. What was once your small and skinny kid brother a few moments ago was now a huge musclebound bodybuilder that looked like he could take on any Mr. Olympia title! Still at a little over 6 feet tall, Alex was now sporting a 300 lbs. physique that made you look puny and weak. his pecs were like steel plates jutting out of his chest. His 8 pack abs were super defined and ripped. His arms must tape at least 22 inches around, cold! His shoulders were so wide and loaded with big traps and delts. his legs were so thick, you were actually comparing their size with the size of your waist!

"Are you done yet?" He asked, seemingly unaware of his sudden transformation.

"Y-yea, I am." You replied somewhat numbly.

"Cool, now I can go play!" He turned around and began dashing off, kicking sand everywhere with his powerful legs.

Your mind as racing as you tried to figure out how this was all possible. What was causing this tremendous growth in your brother? as you recalled what went on during those growth spurts, you think....
11112.title: Alex's muscles inflate even more while you ...

choices: The following morning, Alex is 7 feet tall and ripped!
The following morning, Alex is bigger and more muscular!
111121.content:
You look out over the waves crashing into the shore and you see several kids riding the surf on their surfboards. A few of them stand out. You recognize one of the taller boys from a distance because it just has to be your brother Alex. Then, right next to him, you see another man riding a surfboard. He must be almost twice as tall! Amazing! If Alex was already over six feet tall, then how big was this other guy?

Twenty minutes pass by, and you occasionally look over at the ocean before you as you lay on your towel and work on your tan. Suddenly, you spot Alex from a distance, carrying his surfboard in his muscular arms. My goodness your brother looks like a teenager now. Even worse, he can easily pass for an adult man from a distance since he’s so big and tall and muscular.

But there is an even bigger guy walking next to him. Who is he? You spot the two talking, as the bigger guy is pointing at this huge villa, which is located near the end of the beach. You see an enormous building which seems so have really high ceilings and doors. Finally, Alex and the man come walking towards you.

“Justin! Hey, Justin!” Alex says excitedly.

You look up and see two huge figures towering over you. The first is your brother, who seems even bigger, taller and more buff than ever. Nobody on earth would ever believe that your “little” brother is still twelve years old anymore. Sheet, he looks like he’s eighteen now. He’s got three-hundred pounds of raw muscle and he’s over six feet tall with not an ounce of fat on him. How do you say Olympic Gymnast? The only thing still giving away the fact that he’s twelve years old is his face, and his squeaky voice.

“Justin! This is George! I met him while I was surfing!” Alex said, pointing at the giant man standing next to him.

I stood up and realized that the giant wasn’t even a man… He was a kid, just like Alex! But, he was over ten feet tall and he was just loaded with muscle!

“Hi!” George said, as he shook my hand.

George had red, curly hair and a friendly expression on his face. You could tell that he was a lot younger than he looked.

“Umm… How… How old are you, George?” I asked him.

“Me? Oh I’m thirteen! I work out with other Alpha Kids, in that big white building over there! Alex can join it once he passes ten feet in height!” George explained to us.

But his explanation sent shivers up my spine.

“You’re an Alpha Kid?”

“Yeah! We’re the future kids of America! You can only join if you’re over ten feet tall! And you can tell if you’ll be that tall if you have a big growth spurt during puberty and it seems like Alex is going through that right now! So, once he passes ten feet, he’ll be an Alpha!” he said with a grin.

“And… What do you do there?”

“We eat special food which is very healthy and we work out and we learn how to become leaders of the future over all normal people who are smaller than us!”

“Wow!”

“Isn’t that cool?” Alex cheered. “I wanna be an Alpha Kid!”

“Well, I gotta go! Hopefully I’ll see you guys out here again tomorrow! See you guys later!” George said, as he turned around and started running towards the building.

“Alpha Kids are like between ten and fifty feet tall! I can’t wait! Isn’t that cool, huh, Justin?” Alex grinned, as he grabbed his towel and started drying off.

“Yeah… It’s… very… cool…” I stuttered in disbelief. Just the thought of Alex being fifty feet tall gave me Goosebumps.

“Can we go eat now? I’m starving!” Alex whined.

Oh boy. He’s hungry again! Does that mean he’s gonna grow even more? It might not take so long after all for Alex’s wish to come true and for him to become one of the Alpha Kids…

We turned around and headed for the restaurant where Alex ate twice as much as I did. Good thing we put everything on my parents’ account. Whew!

Alex has a massive growth spurt while you're putting lotion on him!
1111211.content:
After you had returned to the beach house with your younger brother, you had received a phone call from your parents. They had decided to go on a five-day cruise. Since you were on your summer vacation from school, they had asked you to stay at the beach house with Alex all week. They wired over extra cash for you to buy food and sun tan lotion at the small grocery store located down the street. Plus, there was a hotel nearby where you could go eat at, where your parents had an account.

It all worked out. You go to the small shop down the street with Alex, where you buy a box of a dozen bottles of suntan lotion. At the rate that Alex is growing, you figure you’ll be using two bottles just to cover that huge body of his.

The funny thing is, when you walked in the store, you ran into Aunt Doreen. She thought you were Alex and that Alex was Justin! After a few moments, you politely corrected her by pointing out that you were Justin and that the bigger kid standing next to you was your younger brother Alex. The only reason he was bigger and taller than you was because he had experienced a recent growth spurt. She remarked how big Alex had gotten and then she apologized for the fact that she thought that Alex was me, the older brother, much to Alex’s amusement.

The next morning, after we got up, Alex was complaining that he was starving once again. So, we went to the small restaurant in the hotel where he ordered the all-you-can-eat pancakes which was their special for that day. He had four plates with pancake stacks! Amazing!

Once we changed and walked back out to the beach, we located our spot, we set down the umbrella and the lounge chairs and the towels, when he turned towards me.

“Great! I can’t wait to go swimming! I feel great! Time to hit the water!” Alex cheered.

“Hey! You just had that big breakfast! Let the food digest for a few minutes! By the way, it’s gonna get really hot and I need to put some sunscreen on you before you hit the water, so hold up!” I warned him sternly.

“Ohh! Great! I like it when you rub suntan lotion on my body!” Alex said with a huge smile on his face. “It feels so good when you rub it on me and… Uhh…”

For a brief moment Alex stopped talking. He closed his eyes as if he had fallen into a deep trance. He clenched his fists and he craned his head upwards with his eyes closed.

“Alex? Are you okay? What’s going on?” you said to him.

“I… I think I’m gonna grow a little bit…. Uhhhhh…” he suddenly groaned.

Then, my little brother experienced an amazing growth spurt, which happened before my very eyes! His legs suddenly grew seven inches longer, it seemed, while his muscles seemed to expand a few inches all at once! His torso grew bigger and wider at the same time, while his shoulders increased as well! His pectorals bulged a bit and his biceps seemed to add two more inches in size! Not only did he grow over a foot in height, but his muscles just increased in size, all at once! His quads increased in width by three inches at least, not to mention that his calves inflated even more, like balloons!

While I looked on, I could have sworn that I saw my six-foot-tall twelve-year-old brother grow into a seven-foot-tall He-Man of a muscle-man within sixty seconds!

KKKKKKKKRRRRRRRRRR!!!!! Was the sound of bones cracking, which came from Alex’s body, while the fantastic growth spurt was taking place. And all I could do was just stand there and watch, with my jaw wide open, as I witnessed my younger brother grow before my very own eyes!

“Alex? Hey! ALEX!” I shouted.

He opened his eyes, looking around like he was in a daze. Then, when he looked down, he saw you.

“Oh, hey Justin. THERE you are. Down there!”

Yes, it now dawned on you that your little brother was now looking down at you. And boy, was he TALL! It seemed like he had grown over a foot taller! He must have been over 7 feet tall by now! And a whole foot taller than you!

“Okay, big guy! We need to rub some lotion on your body, bro!” you said to him. “Are you ready now? Or, are you gonna grow some more?”

“I… Uhh… “Alex pondered for a moment. I could tell that he wasn’t so sure. “I don’t know!”

You stare at your ‘little’ brother for a moment. Looking at him was like staring at a wall of muscle. Not only did his incredible muscularity frighten the daylights out of you, but these increasing growth spurts were a sign that Alex was going to be gigantic within a matter of days! Each growth spurt was more dramatic than the previous one, and they were occurring more frequently and he was growing by greater increments with each passing one!

“Alex…” I said in a soft tone. “Are… Are you feeling alright?”

My big little brother looked down on me with a smile on his face. It was weird having to look up to the big kid. But, in a way, I couldn’t help feel proud of my little bro. Sure, he annoyed the snot out of me sometimes, but I still loved him to death. I always protected him from bullies and now it seemed like the roles were about to be reversed.

“Sure! I’m feeling great!” he beamed. “And, no matter how big I get, I’ll always protect you, Justin. Even if from now on, you’re gonna be the little bro!”

“Well, thanks, bro!” I said, as I reached down and pulled two unopened bottles of suntan lotion out of the big beach bag. “Let’s get you all you all rubbed in with this lotion!”

I was about to splash some suntan lotion over Alex’s mighty pectorals when…

I opened the suntan lotion and began rubbing it on Alex's pecs. It was amazing actually. He still respected and "looked up" to me even thhough he was so much bigger! I felt really proud as I lotioned up his huge body.

Then it began again.

"Urrr..." Alex groaned as he began growing again. He shot quickly from 7 feet to 15 feet tall in a matter of seconds. At this rate, he would easily outgrow the other Alpha Kids. His muscles grow in proportion to his new height, making him look like a god on Earth.

"Justin...what's happening?" He asked, frightened. "I don't know, buddy. I think we should see a doctor, quick."

So I took him to a pediatrician up the street,who quicky ran some tests. After they finished, Alex and I sat in the waiting room for the results. "Well," began the doctor as he walked in, "This has only been seen three other times in history. Alex is going into hyper puberty. His body is going into overdrive, performing normal pubescent operations but in a vastly increased mode. By our estimates he should reach at least sixty feet tall by the end of the week. He needs lots of rest and food, or it could really hurt his bones and heart."

"Thanks doctor." I said as I took Alex to the beach house, where-

112.content:
You forgot partly why you both came to the beach today was working on your tans. It seems like Alex has always been better at tanning than you are. His whole body has in just one trip to the beach gotten a nice, golden shine to it, while your own is still fairly pale in comparison. It's annoying, but hey, least you're the bigger, stronger one between you both, so in your mind it works out, because that's actually getting you looks, while he's still just a kid.

You finally arrive at the snack bar and order a hotdog and a cola for yourself, and Alex orders a burger with fries and a cola as well. You find a table and sit down to eat, not really talking as people come and go by on the beach. Still, for some reason, you can't help but feel like things are...off. Something just feels so 'different' about today, as if things aren't the way they're supposed to be.

Your head is absolutely swimming, and you have to stand up, nearly falling over as your knees almost give out. Alex, seeing that, concerned, runs over, you are both still brothers after all, and helps steady you. His grip feels surprisingly strong, but you just figure he's needing to help hold you up from that.

"Thanks...bro." you say quietly, still feeling really dizzy, and Alex helps you get into the shade. He gets you some ice to put on your forehead, and as you look over him your eyes go wide. Alex is bigger. There's no doubt about it. Not to mention, he's more ripped than you've ever managed. In fact in just a few short minutes he's gone from being a scrawny kid to total beach bod stud, and now HE'S the one getting all the attention. Even as he helps you out, it's clear people are walking by multiple times just to capture glimpses of him.

Alex's body is well proportioned and ripped. He's got the works, abs, pecs, biceps, shoulders, forearms, big quads, solid calves, everything, which are all the more highlighted by his natural tan. Another strong wave of dizziness hits, and you nearly pass out from it. By the time you recover enough not to feel like you wanna puke, Alex's muscles are doubled in size and still as ripped, yet it sits on his frame (which so far is not any taller, but it is wider to handle the extra bulk) perfectly, as if it is the most natural thing in the world, and to Alex, it seems like it really is.

A third wave of dizziness hits, and...

1121.content:
He had grown even larger still, a couple inches taller now to better handle the mass he'd gained. By no means was he any less ripped either. Heck, now he could almost pass as an amateur bodybuilder in terms of his size overall. If you weren't seeing it, you wouldn't be able to believe it. You know, you KNOW he was just a scrawny kid a few minutes ago, but now...he was big!

You looked yourself over, you'd gotten to sit down at a picnic table, and saw your own body, which was completely unchanged, you weren't shrinking or anything, but there was no doubt Alex was looking like a true young Adonis as he flexed and showed off for the group of people around him, mostly women in their 20s, all quite good looking themselves as they fawned and doted over his muscles.

In turn he showed off to them, smiling an award winning smile, carrying the women around on his shoulders or in his arms, or even letting them all sit at another picnic table and then lifting that, with all of them sitting at it, up and over his head, with ease. Jeez he was strong to boot? What DIDN'T Alex have at this point?

It wasn't fair, you thought to yourself. Why was he growing, why now, and why only him? You'd worked HARD for your body, while not the best in the world, it was YOUR work you had put in, and yet now somehow he magically gets muscle making HIM the new king of the beach? It was completely unfair!

You'd tried standing up, but whatever affected you, still is, and you sit back down, too dizzy to stand up. Your head is absolutely swimming and it just feels like you're completely powerless to stop whatever is happening to Alex and to yourself.

Still, the women do move on in time, it seems even they can't stay doting around Alex forever. Silver linings at least, and Alex himself, while he clearly was having a good time, he wanted to do other stuff like go workout in the beach gym nearby.

Dizziness once again strikes you and when you look back at Alex, he...

grab Alex and force him to leave with you

11211.content:
You blink in disbelief at the impossible sight before you, that of an Alex who has gained yet MORE imposing size and bronzed, bulging muscle mass! He stands only two inches shorter than you now, and boasts the stunning, laser-defined physique of a young Greek god! Given your younger brother's handsome facial features and curly, dark-hair, you can't help being reminded of illustrations of Superboy, except Alex has grown considerably buffer and more cut than the comic book superhero was ever depicted as being.

You close your eyes and sit still for a moment to dispel the dizziness, before forcing yourself to your feet. How this can possibly be happening, you have no idea, but that doesn't matter right now. All that matters at the moment is getting the two of you home and showing Alex to Mom and Dad, if only to confirm that this it is really happening and that you aren't losing your mind.

Come to think of it, compared to the alternative, mental illness might actually be preferable in this case.

You march boldly up to Alex, swallowing inadvertently when you get a close-up view of the transformed twelve year-old titan's amazing musculature. Not only is he much thicker than you, but his cannonball shoulders are even broader than yours!

"Come on, we're going home," you tell him curtly, doing your best to ignore the aura of pure physical power Alex projects.

In response your formerly "little" brother actually laughs at you!

"You're dreaming, bro! I haven't even worked out yet! We're gonna out be here for at least a couple more hours, so sit down, shut up and be a good boy until I'm ready to leave." Alex accentuates his arrogant order with a noticeable flexing of his phenomenally large, perfect pectoral muscles.

You're so angry you don't know how to react at first. How dare Alex talk to you like that! Who the hell does he think he is?Impossible preteen powerhouse or not, you won't take this crap from him! You . . .

choices: He orders you to towel him off while he works out.
He orders you to go home.

112113.content:
You ball up your fist in anger, absolutely infuriated with Alex's attitude problem, not thinking straight, and slam it right into his relaxed abdominal muscles.

CRACK!

You're immediately recoiling back from pain. It felt like you might as well have tried to punch through a stone wall. He wasn't even flexing and you are in utter agony as you reel back in pain, groaning as you nurse it carefully. But you aren't focused on just that for long as you're met with another fist, this time right into your own stomach, instantly putting you on the ground.

Alex stands over you with a disdained, angry look on his face, "What the hell brought that on?" he asks, in a cold fury. "Seriously, what the hell got into you all of a sudden? I grow muscle faster and all of a sudden you're getting pissy with me over it? I've done nothing to you this WHOLE time, and you still try and act like this?"
"Alex! Something is wrong, I don't know why but-" before you can continue he reaches down and clamps his hand over your mouth.
"Quiet." he says with an intent that makes you wonder if you'll even survive what you just did to him, "I get it. You're jealous. Anyone would be. I've understood that for awhile. I thought we'd reached an understanding, but apparently not. I only hit you once because you only hit me once."

He lets go of your mouth and stands up, sighing and thinking for a few moments. You stare up at him. It's a bit hard to deny he looks like a young Adonis. His shoulders are broad, arms thick, pecs heavy, and legs looking oh-so-powerful. A real young alpha standing in front of you, of that, there is no doubt.

To appease him, you chance something, and kiss at his feet, giving a quick, reverent smooch to each one, which he finds bemusing, looking down at you over his pecs and smirking. Alex lifts a foot up and kicks sand in your face, causing you to suddenly cough and sputter as the granules get in your eyes, nose, and mouth, causing him to laugh a bit at you.

"Sheesh that was quick. I didn't even tell you to do anything and yet you kissed my feet like that. It's kinda sad, but good on you I guess for trying to appease me so quickly." he laughs a bit more, "So I guess that just leaves me with the choice of what to do with you, bro."
112113.title: CRACK!

choices: Amnesia is one side effect.
I volunteered, you didn't.
