Something Else
1511.content:
"What's the matter, Justin?" Alex said, as he gave you a confused look.

Here you were, seventeen years old and almost six feet tall, locked up in your gigantic house behind all the closed doors and windows and your parents weren't home. To make matters even worse, you were looking your little, twelve-year-old brother Alex straight in the face! Even though he was supposed to be five years younger than you, he was exactly your height! What the heck was going on here?

"Alex! You... You're huge!" you exclaimed.

"What are you talking about, Justin?" he replied calmly, like there wasn't anything unusual about him being the same height as you.

"Look at yourself! You're just as tall as I am!"

Alex just shrugged.

"So?"

"What do you mean, 'So?'" you said angrily. "You're freaking five years younger than me, dude!"

"So what? I've always been kinda on the big side! Jeez Justin, chill out!" Alex said as he rolled his eyes. "I'm gonna watch some TV man, you're freaking me out!"

"Alex! Help me get the key! Don't you wanna get outta here?" you shouted at him.

"Why? This is our house! I'm comfortable here! I want to watch TV! Why don't you just go to your room and chillax!"

You just stood there with your jaw open wide. You shook your head and marched off to your bedroom, where everything looked the same except for the fact that everything was indeed twice as big as it was before: your desk was higher and bigger and wider than before; your bed was much bigger than it was earlier, your dresser was huge and your closet was much taller and wider. Luckily, however, when you opened the closet, all your clothes were still there and your shoes were still on the floor. Strangely enough, all your clothes were still made to fit your size. So, why did it seem like everything else had gotten bigger? Something didn't seem right. The house truly was the same house as yours, but everything had grown except you. However, something weird appeared to be going on with your little brother, and he didn't seem to think it was weird that he was becoming bigger and bigger.

You just crawled on your big bed and lay down for awhile. For some strange reason, Alex was in no hurry at all to get out of the house and he seemed to be perfectly happy to stay here. Not only that, he seemed to just fall in love with the giant flatscreen TV set in the living room, which you never had before. Where did that come from and how did it get in the house?

Finally, you just dozed off and took a short nap. When you woke up, your throat was dry and your stomach was growling. You got up and realized that everything was still big in your room, so you quietly walked back to the living room where Alex was still watching the giant flatscreen TV. He lay on the couch and he had covered himself with a blanket, so you couldn't notice anything different about him at first. When you walked to the kitchen, you opened the giant fridge and you got out the carton of milk and you grabbed a glass out of the cupboard that you were barely able to reach.

"Hey... Do you want something to eat or to drink?" you asked your little bro.

"Yeah! I'm starving!"

Alex got up and walked over to you. You didn't see him at first because he was standing behind you. When you turned around, you were startled when you were looking him straight in the chest.

"WHOOAA!!" you screamed, as you looked at his pectorals.

"Dang it Justin! It's only ME!" Alex yelled back, looking down at you.

There you were, looking UP at Alex, your twelve-year-old brother, who was now at least eight inches taller than you!

"ALEX! What the heck! What.... You... You GREW!!!!"

Alex just let out a deep sigh as he rolled his eyes.

"Here we go again..." he groaned. "Can you pass me the milk, Justin? I'm REALLY thirsty over here!"

You passed him the glass, practically trembling with fear as you looked up to your giant brother. Goodness, he was BIG. He was at least 6 foot 8 inches tall, but he still looked exactly the same as before. He still looked like a twelve year-old boy, but much BIGGER.

"Let's find something to eat, okay?" he said. "I'm starving!"

You just stared at him, looking up, with your jaw open wide. You could just imagine how much food he could consume.

"S-s-sure, Alex..." you replied, as you turned around and opened the fridge.

You decided to make the both of you some sandwiches. Dinner with your new, giant-size brother would be very interesting, to say the least...

Justin was sweating a little, he tried to explain but his brother didn't want to hear it. They stopped at the food court and had lunch but the boys told Justin he had to go without. After they got done they headed back home and when they got back they punished Justin some more by making him?

1512.content:
"Alex, where'd you get the TV remote?" You asked, confused.

Alex only shrugged, turning it over in his hands. It was almost as long as his whole arm, reaching from his palms up to the hems of his oddly short sleeves. The buttons looked huge against his fingers.

"I don't know, I just turned around and it was there on the floor, where you said the glove was!" He frowned, tugging on the shoulders of his shirt. "It was on the coffee table, remember?"

"This is weird." You muttered, pulling the controller from his hands. You ignored his brief protest.

"First the gloves disappear, and now the remote moved on its own?"

"Well what do we do about it?" Alex asked, snatching the remote back from you with a scowl and standing up in the doorway. "I mean, I'm not getting shocked again, and watching a giant TV sounds kinda fun."

That said, your little brother promptly turned on his heel and marched back toward the living room.

"Hold it," you growled, walking quickly to catch up with the little creep. "We had a deal, and if you think I'm-"

"Look!"

Stopping mid-rant, you quickly traced along your brother's finger and up to the coffee table. From below, you could easily look through it's glass top to see the gloves sitting right in the middle. You blinked.

Yep, still there.

"Alex," you whispered seriously, "I think something very, very weird is going on. And not just giant house weird."

"Is someone messing with us?" Your brother asked incredulously.

A sudden, sharp 'pop' sound startled both of you. Alex looked down, confused.

"I think they're doing something to my clothes, too." He said hesitantly, staring at the popped button of his jeans, which rested below a bare sliver of skin showing under the hem of his shirt.

You looked him up and down. It did look like something was shrinking his clothes; his shirt was too short and tight, his pants were showing an inch or so of bare ankle, and now his pants had popped open. You quickly checked yourself out; no, you seemed fine. But then, you liked wearing baggy clothes; maybe you just couldn't tell yet.

"I've seen pranks like that," you nodded, but looked up sharply at the remote, "but not like that. And we haven't seen anybody! Are they invisible or something? And how are we supposed to get out of here without the gloves?"

"Easy." Alex brightened, and firmly pushed down on your shoulder.

When you were in a crouch, your brother simply repeated what you'd tried on the door. You grinned.

"Duh. And the table's way lower, this'll be a piece of cake." You quickly winced as Alex shifted his weight. "Oof. Seriously, kid, after this you are laying off the cake. I think my shoulders are still bruised from last time; you're the heaviest midget ever!"

"Shut up." Alex grumbled as he stretched his arms out above the table. At least he didn't need tiptoes this time!

You stifled a yelp as he raised up one foot - putting all his weight on the other one! - and tried to swing it up over the table.

"I...can't...reach!" Your brother groaned, frustrated. Even if the tabletop was within easy reach, your brother couldn't get enough of a grip on the slippery glass to pull himself up!

"Now what do we do?" He asked morosely as the two of you flopped down on the carpet below the table in defeat.

You shrugged. You were officially out of ideas. Shooting a glance over, you offered your brother a weak grin.

"Watch some awesome big screen TV?" You suggested idly.

His eyes lit up like christmas. You couldn't help smiling too, thought that might have been because he accidentally ripped the sleeve of his favorite shirt when he pumped his arm in victory.

Picking up the remote, you checked to see if the power button was in the right place. You frowned. Alex, waiting impatiently for you to do something, looked over to see what was wrong.

There was the same big red button in the corner like always, but it didn't say power.

Alex turned to look you in they eye.

"What the heck is 'Click Me' supposed to mean?"

Something was clearly messing with you and your brother, and the last thing you wanted to do was do something they wanted and walk into some sort of trap.

But your little brother didn't think any of this.

"But you promised!" Alex whined. He had his sights on the huge TV ever since he saw it, and he wasn't going to let two words stop him. "You said we can watch TV! It's just a remote control, so let's just turn it on!" He reached over and pushed down on it.

"Alex no!" You cried as-
15121.title: Click Me!

choices: The giant boy plays with you!
You retaliate with a bite!
Elsewhere, Alex is just starting to wake up...
1513.content:
"Alex!" you shouted at your little brother, as you saw the young boy was now asleep. You just groaned, running your hand down your face. "It's gonna be a long day, I just know it..." You grumbled to yourself.

For the time being, it was probably best to let Alex get a little rest. You would just have to be sure to work him even harder when he woke up! Now, however, with the rubber glove gone, you had to think of something else that he could use.

"Rubber would probably work best..." You thought, stroking your chin, "Wood doesn't conduct electricity either... But it does burn... And then there's also plastic... I think..." You began to walk on, leaving your brother behind as you tried to find what you could use next. After all, using the wrong thing could result in one of you getting an even worse shock than before!

As you moved about, you couldn't quite shake the feeling of being watched. This was a big house after all, someone had to live in it! The feeling gave you goosebumps, but you'd do your best to bravely face whatever came your way!

Unbeknownst to you, not too far away, a large boy was watching as you wandered through the house. "Whoa..." he mumbled to himself, "I don't remember a toy like that... I wonder if he's that new action figure mom bought me...?" he whispered to himself. Just as you were about to whip around, the boy hid back behind the corner. He waited a good few seconds before peering around once more. You had continued to wander onwards. As you did, the giant boy held up the rubber glove. "If he's my action figure, then why's this accessory so huge?" he asked himself.

You continued to wander, soon making it into what appeared to be someone's bedroom. Looking around the room, you spotted a toy gun that shot little discs. It would take a careful hand, but surely you could use that! You ran over near a toy box, where you picked up the gun. It was perfect for someone your size! Just as things were looking up, you heard a slam from behind. Turning around, you saw that the door was closed! And standing in the doorway was some colossal boy!

"What the...?" you said under your breath, still holding the gun as your neck slowly craned up, looking up at the boy.

As far as appearances, he must have been at least twice your height! He even looked big considering the rest of the house; if you had somehow been on scale with everything else ithe room, he'd still be over six and a half feet tall, much too big for a boy his age. His hair was messy and milky brown, while his eyes stuck out like two green emeralds. He wore a blue tanktop, and black khaki shorts. He was barefoot, but that was a given after all; he was in his own house!

"Come here new toy..." He said softly, making his way toward you. Each footstep created a loud thud that only grew louder with each passing second! Soon, it shook the ground where you stood! You dropped the toy gun and tried to make a run for it.

"I-I'm not a toy!" you shouted out as you fled, but the boy couldn't hear. The giant's eyes sparkled with anticipation as he closed in on you.

Cornered, you had nowhere to run! Like a rat with its back to the wall, you turned and looked all the way up, only to see a large hand scoop you up! The boy grinned at you as you were lifted to the boy's face, which left you a bit dazed.

"I wonder what you do...?" The boy said quietly to himself as he was looking at you.
1513.title: Is This Really the Time!?!?

choices: Alex grows and joins in Hunter's fun
Alex grows but resists Hunter, starting a power struggle.
15133.content:
As you screamed for help, your brother Alex woke up downstairs, standing up and stretching his hands into the air, hearing a loud RIIIIPPPP as he did so. Looking down at his pants -- well, now, shorts -- he saw that they had split along the sides as he stretched, revealing his blue boxer-briefs. "Darn clothes," he thought. "That's the last time I let Justin throw my stuff in with his laundry; it always ends up shrunk!"

As he stood up and looked around the kitchen, though, he realized something was different. "Hey," he thought to himself, "did I get taller since I went to sleep?" He seemed to be more level with the tops of the kitchen table, able to And where did that key we were trying to get go?" he wondered as he looked up at the empty peg.

You screamed again, and this time, fortunately, Alex heard you. "Justin?" he yelled, starting to panic. "Where are you?"

"I'm upstairs! Please help! I've been--"

Your large captor had decided that he had enough of you screaming, and took some duct tape from his drawer and wrapped a large (to you at least) piece around your mouth. You tried to scream, but it was too muffled to make out.

"Now, what kind of fun should I have with you?" the boy asked aloud as he sat you on the top of his desk, what looked to be about eight feet off of the ground. He kept his hand against your body, pinning you to the desk, his grip vice-like, leaving you unable to resist or flee.

You saw a mischievous, if not evil, smile cross his face. "How would you like to feel the bottom of my foot for a while?" he asked. You struggled in vain to wriggle free as he picked you up again, bending down and sitting you on the floor. Before he let go, he moved his foot on top of you, which had a bit of a smell and seemed to be huge even considering everything else large about this boy, nearly covering your entire torso.

He inched up his toes towards your face, but right before he was about to cover your mouth with his big toe, you heard the door open, and he spun around to see your brother come in.

"Alex!" the boy's eyes lit up. "What took you so long?"

"Huh?" Alex asked as he looked up at the giant. "What do you mean, Hunter? Why are you in my room?"

"Uh, Alex?" Hunter said, grinning. "this is my house and my room. Remember? We were having a sleepover!"

"We were?" Alex scratched his head, looking around. "Since when is your house -- and you, for that matter -- so big?"

Hunter laughed, causing him to finally lift his foot from your body, freeing you. You scampered over as fast as you could towards your brother, ripping the duct tape from your mouth. "You know this kid?" you said to Alex. "He's crazy!"

As the giant started to move towards you, you started to cower. Looking over at your brother, you had another bit of shock to see that he was now a good three or four inches taller than you! His clothes had become skin-tight and were starting to tear at the seams. "What happened to you?" you whispered to him.

"I don't know, I just woke up like this!" he hissed.

"Actually," Hunter said as he sat down on the bed near the two of you, his face looming over, "I think I'd rather show you how I got so big. Watch this!" He reached into his drawer and pulled out a key-- wait, not just a key. THE Key! The same one you and Alex had been trying to get downstairs!

"How-- where did you--?" your voice stuttered as you tried to make sense of the situation.

"It's best to not ask questions, little toy," Hunter said as he held the key in his hands, and you saw the hairs on his skin and on the top of his head begin to stand on their ends. He seemed to be a little in pain, obviously getting some sort of electrical shock that got worse over time, but he held on to the key for a full ten seconds until he finally had to drop it on the bed. "Wheeew," Hunter said, wiping his brow. "That hurt like crazy! But it was worth it."

"What do you mean," you asked, "worth it?"

Without answering, or perhaps IN answer, Hunter stood up and posed with his hands on his hips. As soon as he did this, you could tell his already-large body was beginning to increase in size! His toes were pushing towards you as his head got closer and closer to the ceiling. He went from looming to towering over you, as you went from being eye-level with his waist, to his crotch, then to his knees. The tank top and shorts he was wearing seemed to grow with him, but couldn't quite keep up to his growth rate, ending up snug on the boy and revealing his fit, lean belly as the shirt rode up on it. Finally, he seemed to stop growing for a while when his head touched the ceiling, and he stood there, excited as could be.

"What do you think, Alex?" he asked. "Wanna try it with me?"

You looked in horror at your little brother as Hunter bent down, holding out the key to Alex and then dropping it on the ground. You knew your brother had resented you a little, even for telling him what to do while the two of you were searching for a way out of this place, but you wouldn't think he was crazy enough to --
15133.title: Enter Little Brother (Okay, Less Little)

choices: The two boys begin to wrestle and you're still between them!
The boys suddenly remember you and begin their fun!
151331.content:
Alex looked up at Hunter and then down at you, biting his lower lip slightly. It seemed like he was thinking hard about his decision. Hunter had a knowing smirk on his face, as though there was no possible way Alex wouldn't immediately do as he said. You had nothing but ill feelings toward this massive kid. He weren't even sure who he was! You'd certainly never seen him before. Alex seemed to be on familiar terms with him so it was a safe bet that they were friends. There was still too many questions though. Why did this kid think that this was his room in his house? It was clearly yours and Alex's! The pictures on the fridge, the layout, and all the items in the house being in their proper place confirmed that. That was all without factoring in the size of the house, Hunter's size, and the strange key that seemed to be the cause of all this. Just what was this place? Were you dreaming? You pinched yourself on the arm to test it, a sharp pain indicating that, no, this wasn't a dream. Or at least not your dream.

Suddenly, you recalled a scene from Alice Through the Looking Glass. She was having a conversation with Tweedle Dum and Tweedle Dee when she noticed a terribly loud sound. It was from the Red King who was sleeping nearby. The Tweedle's both put forth the idea that the entire world, including Alice, was a dream and that if the Red King should ever wake up she would cease to exist. At the end of the story, Alice herself wakes up and wonders what that would mean for all the people and things she had met during her adventure. Did they cease to exist? Or did they never exist in the first place? Did they only exist long enough to provide Alice with her dream? It was a question that had always caught your attention, even after the rest of the story faded to obscurity (there was a unicorn and a goat or...something, you could never remember. Books weren't your thing anyway). What if that was what was happening right now? Was Alex or even Hunter dreaming and this entire house and everyone in it nothing more than a fabrication? Dream logic would go a long way to explaining the oddities here...you shook your head and pushed away these thoughts. No way! You were not just some fantasy cooked up by some dumb kid! That key was your only hope of escape and you weren't about to let it pass you by! You ran over to where the key was and reached your hand out for it...just as Alex snatched it up in his own hand!

"Alright! I'll join y-y-YEOUCH!" He yelled, the electric shock making him flinch, dropping the key...right on your head! The key was surprisingly dense for such an average looking thing, causing you to see stars. You stumbled a bit, looking up at Alex in a daze. He was frowning at his hand, flexing his fingers as the last of the pain from the shock left him...before starting to grow! You could only watch helplessly as your formerly little brother began to stretch up, taller and wider, his already torn shorts ripping apart entirely, leaving him only in a pair of tight boxer briefs which looked like they wouldn't be surviving much longer. His shirt, which had already grown too small for him, barely covering his chest, quickly ripped apart as well, his shoulders and arms too much for the sleeves to handle while a long tear ran down the center of it, the scraps falling to the floor around you. Suddenly, his head bumped against the ceiling eliciting a little yelp from Alex. "Wow...." he said, looking around in amazement. "Everything looks so...small!"

Hunter laughed and shoved his foot against your back, sending you falling face down to the floor. "Especially this little guy!"

Alex laughed and crouched down, roughly grabbing the back of your shirt and forcing you back on your feet. "Hey there little brother! How do you like being the small one huh?" He poked you rather hard in the chest, forcing you to step back. "Not so tough now are you? Now you can't boss me around anymore and be mean!"

"Come on Alex! I was just messing around! It's what brothers do right? Have some fun?" You knew perfectly well that nothing you ever did with him had been "fun", at least not in his eyes. But you were hoping he would have mercy on you. His smile just widened at your words.

"Yeah, that's true! And now it's MY turn to have fun with YOU!" His smile was a full blown grin at this point. You gulped and decided to throw caution to the winds. You turned on your heels, snatched the key and made a run for the door!

You had barely taken five steps before Hunter grabbed you by the back of your shirt and hoisted you into the air, his other arm snaking around your chest and pulling you close against his body. "Oh no you don't! You're not getting away THAT easily!"

You desperately tried to struggle, the key heating up in your hand. Unfortunately for you, Hunter's grip was too strong. He may have only been a little kid, but at his height and with his proportions he was far heavier and stronger than he had any right to be. You might as well have been a toddler in the arms of an adult! Suddenly, an electric shock coursed through your body, causing you to instinctively drop the key. Alex groaned and said, "Hunter! You let him use the key!"

Hunter merely grinned and said, "Don't worry about it! That key won't work for him! At least, not the way he thinks it will!"

You suddenly felt light headed. What did Hunter mean? Was his grip getting tighter? You looked down at his arm and were shocked to see it looked bigger! Was he growing again? You looked down to see if you were getting further away from the ground, but instead caught sight of your shoes, socks, and pants seemingly growing larger!

"That's so cool! He's getting smaller!" Alex said happily, moving in closer for a better look, his foot resting on top of the key. Alex yelped as the key shocked him yet again, his body expanding a few inches taller.

"Hey, careful!" Hunter said, picking up the key and sticking it back in the drawer. "We gotta be careful with that key!"

Alex gently pushed Hunter and said, "You're just jealous I'm taller now!"

Hunter pushed back and laughed. "Am not!"

"You totally are!"

"Yeah right, keep talking!"

As the two giant kids kept shoving each other you were caught in the middle, getting crushed between their bodies. You pushed desperately against your brother's bare torso with both hands and feet but he didn't even notice you! It didn't help that you were now several inches shorter than your normal height, your now too large clothes draping awkwardly on your body. This whole situation was getting worse by the minute!
151331.title: Ruminations and Discovery

choices: ... Make your brother give us foot massages?" Hunter suggested
... Go get a snack from the kitchen?" Hunter asked
1513311.content:
Just then, Alex was pushed on his bottom, Hunter standing over him. You, in the meantime, were still on Alex's chest, but no one seemed to notice. Without warning, Hunter suddenly jumped down on Alex, and the two boys began to have a playful wrestling match. There was laughing and grunts, as you were pinned tight to your brother's, surprisingly soft, chest.

The boys continued to rumble, dominance constantly shifting between the two. Just when it seemed like a perfect chance to escape, the boys maneuvered so you were pinned down by one of them again! The cycle never seemed to end, but at this point, you were grateful just to still be alive!

Alex got Hunter in a leg lock. Then Hunter had Alex in a half nelson. Alex, with his new strength, lifted Hunter in the air. Hunter later got Alex in a grapple, but Alex turned it around, and soon he had pinned Hunter down!

"One! Two!" Alex began to count. Hunter was really starting to struggle, but to no avail. "Three!" With that, Alex popped up, beating on his chest like an ape. "I win! I win!" He cheered happily. Hunter just grinned. He didn't even notice as you were on his groin!

"Yeah, yeah..." He chuckled. He may have lost, but at least he was a good sport about it. Alex soon sat down, and the two boys were breathing heavily, taking a break after such an intense match. The two just smiled at each other happily, before their worn expressions returned.

"That was... fun..." Alex panted, his whole body a slight shade of red. Hunter, who was slightly more tanned than Alex, was sweating like crazy! Even on his crotch, you could smell a strong boy musk permeating the air. It carried a scent that was almost addicting, as you couldn't stop your nose from sniffing.

"Hey, wait... Where's my brother...?" Alex said, looking around. "Aw man! Did we let him escape!?"

The two looked around for a bit, as you were too enticed by Hunter's boy musk to notice. Hunter soon noticed you and smiled. "There he is!" He said, pointing below his waist. Alex looked and saw you, a faint smile on his face.

"Oh, good... If I lost him, my mom would kill me..." Alex said softly, as he finally started to get his second wind.

"You know Alex..." Hunter began, "That was a great match... But now I'm tired... You wanna...
1513311.title: KWE: Kids Wrestling Entertainment

choices: Alex holds the key, smiling, as you notice his boxer-briefs have tented upward.
The room starts to shake as Hunter's head bursts through the floor below.
15133111.content:
"Yeah! Let's do it!" Alex exclaimed, looking down at Hunter's groin (which, you assumed, meant he was looking at you… though you weren't sure by the way he licked his lips). Hunter had to scoot up against the wall to get his feet up on the bed, being too big to lie down on it. This meant there wasn't enough room for Alex, so he knelt down at the end by Hunter's feet to watch. Hunter peeled you off of his groin and placed you on the bed, right in between his feet.

The idea of giving these two massive preteen boys a foot massage seemed abhorrent to your brain, especially since one of them was your annoying (formerly) little brother. But something was going on inside of you, possibly from the scent in the air, possibly from something else. As much as you hated to admit it, part of you had started to actually feel like you wanted to help them, to please them in any way possible. The thought of it even started stirring certain feelings that were usually only meant for your girlfriend (or, really, any other modestly attractive girl you happened to see in person or anywhere else). You tried to shake them off, but that just made them more powerful. If this was a dream, you hoped you woke up fast.

It hadn't really dawned on you yet just how big the two boys actually were until this point. His feet were almost as tall as you were! You were expecting their stench to be overpowering, but actually the odor was pleasant and oddly intoxicating. Stretching out along the bed were two long, smooth legs leading to his shorts, his torso covered by the stretched-out tank-top, and the smiling face rising above.

"Go ahead, Justin," Alex said, with a playful smile, as he pulled your loose shirt off with one motion, leaving your muscled chest uncovered. He then shoved you towards his friend's feet, his large fingers pressing into your back. "Get to it!"

You were unable to resist and did as your brother commanded. Hunter started to wiggle his toes as you began rubbing your hands up and down them. The undersides of his feet were rough and course, like someone who had gone barefoot outside a lot. You found a couple of spots that, when you hit them, caused Hunter to moan a bit. Wanting to do a good job and not piss off the giant, you focused more on those areas, causing Hunter to squirm as you did so. The movement of his legs and feet nearly sent you flying off of the bed at one point, but you were able to grab on to his toes and keep his balance.

"Mmmm," Hunter said after a few minutes, "that was great."

"My turn!" Alex said as he playfully tugged at Hunter's arm. Grinning in agreement, Hunter swung his feet around on the floor and got off the bed, making room. Alex jumped up and landed on the bed with a big PLOP, sending you flying into the air. Luckily, you landed back on the bed, the mattress and blankets cushioning your fall. As he got into position, you noticed that his underwear, snug as it was, now seemed to be riding down his hips a bit. You saw a small sliver of the area below his waist, and soft and smooth as it looked, you fought the urge to see any more.

Finally, Alex was ready, and you started massaging his feet for him. His were even bigger than Hunter's, a little longer than you were tall, and you could only concentrate on one at a time. This didn't seem to bother Alex any, though, as he seemed to be enjoying it even more than Hunter had. You tried to work the toes with one hand, using the other to push into the soles, which were much softer and smoother than Hunter's had been. He moved around even more, almost kicking outwards at some point, but you had become quick and agile and could time your movements to avoid your brother's pleasure-spasms.

As you started to switch from his right foot to his left, you realized you had been focusing so much on Alex, you had lost track of Hunter. Looking behind you quickly, you noticed he was no longer there. You wondered where he went. Shrugging, you guessed he went downstairs for a sandwich or something. Anyways, it couldn't be important, so you started to turn back to Alex's feet, when something interrupted your thoughts. The key! You turned your head to the drawer Hunter had placed the key in, horrified to see that it was opened and empty. You started to panic as you tried to figure out where the key could've gone to, but it only took a moment to get your answer.
15133111.title: Foot Masseur

choices: Hunter comes up from downstairs!
Another new giant kid comes out of your room!
151331111.content:
Frantically opening and shutting the bureaus must have clued Alex off to what you were doing, because as you checked under the bed for the key you heard his unusually loud voice softly belt out, "Looking for something?"

You turned around just in time to see Alex's feet re-positioned back in your face, which you quickly looked past. To your dismay, the scene was that of your colossal brother, seven times your height, waving a (comparatively) miniscule key pinched between his thumb and index finger with a grin spread out on his face. He began talking as steam seemed to erupt from the key.

"Sorry, little guy, but this thing is mine. Hey, bro, how- ow!- how big do- ah!- do you think I'll aah, AAH!"

The key let out several bolts of energy while Alex was talking, each larger than the last, until Alex was finally forced to drop the key- onto his stomach. He let out a yowl of pain as you saw the key begin to glow red, then brushed it off reflexively- in your direction. You tried not to make too much motion as he went about blowing on the burns on his fingers, but when you started seeing his feet expand and the bed started creaking in complaint, you knew it was time to go. You don't know what's going on here at all, but you do know that that key is part of it, and that every second it remains in your gigantic brother's possession, things were going to get worse. You grab the key with both hands lying next to your brother's swelling calf muscles and run for it, out of the room and down the corridor. You hear a bellowing "HEY!" in the background, along with a THUMP. It sounds like Alex has realized the flaw in growing inside- he's pinned himself inside Alex/Hunter's room! You can already feel the key getting warm in your arms, but it doesn't matter- all that's important is finding a hiding place before it's too late. Various other WHAMS fill the air as more of Alex's appendages forcibly make space in the cramped room. You juggle briefly whether to hide in the closet, go downstairs, or hide in your room when your decision is interrupted.
151331111.title: The situation is key.

choices: Alex is annoyed and tries to wrestle the key from Hunter.
Hunter has some...personal needs he'd like taken care of.
151331112.content:
The room around you and your brother began to vibrate, gently at first, before a distinct rumbling could be heard and felt, like distant thunder. Alex sat up and looked around with a surprised look on his face. "What the heck is that?"

You shook your head as the room started to shake even more violently. You stumbled a bit as you tried to keep your balance. Something was definitely going on downstairs! You were about to rush out the door when you realized that it was closed and you were now far too small to reach the knob. Frustration built up inside you until you felt like screaming! Being so short sucked more than you ever thought it could! You rushed over to Alex and slapped his stomach, hard with your tiny palm. Alex winced and yelped a little, glaring down at you. "Get downstairs and find out what that is!"

Alex's glare got darker as his fist closed around your body. "Shut up! You're not ordering me around any more remember?" He squeezed you rather hard, your ribs compressing painfully. However, even though his grip was quite crushing, you were perfectly fine. Your tiny body was quite resilient. Suddenly Alex held you close to his chest. "Wow...look at that!"

You looked as he pointed at the center of the room. It seemed like it was...bulging up! With a loud CRACK sound, more of the floor started bulging up, before the carpet split open like a rotten fruit. The room was now shaking violently, the furniture jumping and rattling around, posters peeling from the walls while the various items on the dresser clattered to the floor. Finally, the floor blew upward, wood, plaster, and cement firing in all directions. Alex actually shielded you with his body, turning his back to the flying debris. He shakily turned around and you were finally able to see what had caused this damage. Hunter's massive face was grinning at you, his head nearly filling the whole room, his head pressed tightly against the roof of his room. More pieces of the floor fell as Hunter shifted around a little, getting more comfortable.

Gaining a little courage, you managed to break free of Alex's grasp and look down through the floor. Hunter's feet had wreaked havoc in the living room down below. The couch was crushed under his right foot while the TV had been smashed by his left big toe. His shorts were shorter than ever on his athletic body, his tank top now skin tight and barely covering his chest. His shoulders were pressed up against the ceiling of the first floor. He carelessly blew a strand of hair out of his face and said, "That worked better than I thought it would!"

Alex blinked and looked annoyed. "No fair! I want to get bigger too!"

Hunter shook his finger a little condescendingly at Alex. "No way! Someone needs to regulate how we use the key! That person is me! This IS my house after all!"

"Where's the key?" You shouted.

Hunter patted his chest as an answer. You looked and saw the outline of the key inside a stretched pocket. The cotton of the shirt seemed to be muffling the power of the key.

"So..." Hunter crossed his arms and looked dangerously down at you and Alex. "What to do now?"
151331112.title: New Pecking Order

choices: Hunter tossed Alex into his mouth to strike fear into him!
Alex just manages to touch the key, and starts to grow bigger!
1513311121.content:
Hunter was big before. But from your new perspective, he was truly huge! Not to mention this was only his head! God only knows how big he was if he was standing, let alone how much the rest of his musculature must have increased from using the key!

"Hey! Alex! Pass me the toy!" Hunter said with a grin. Alex then picked you up, and began walking tword Hunter.

"A-Alex!? What are you doing! Don't bring me to him!" You pleaded, "I'm your big brother! Who knows what he'll do to me!?"

Alex made no reply as he soon walked up to Hunter's chest. It was almost as if Hunter was some kind of god or idol, and Alex was about to put up an offering. Just as it seemed that you were going to be tortured, Alex tossed you behind him! You just barely landed on the edge of the bed, grasping the polyester sheets so you wouldn't fall off! As you pulled yourself up and looked over, you just managed to see Alex spring up and bop Hunter in the nose! Hunter flinched, pulling back a little bit.

"Ow!" He groaned as he was hit. He may have been huge, sure, but Alex was by no means small either! He at least managed to do a little damage. As Hunter's eyes re-opened, you immediately noticed how they turned from fun-loving to a dark, unhappy expression. This would not end well...

Alex kept up his assult. He couldn't exactly wrestle Hunter at this size, but he sure was doing all he could! He rammed into Hunter's chest, doing his best to claw and tear open the pocket; reaching inside from above was impossible. The shirt was so tight, the pocket's opening was sealed like an envelope, only a hundred times tighter! As Alex kept up his assult, he managed to get a small enough tear that would allow him to at least touch the key!

Just then, you were able to feel a rumble... Which soon grew more vigorous! It was like an earthquake! Suddenly, Hunter's powerful arm rose up from below, leaving nothing but destruction in it's wake. It immediately pinned Alex down where he stood, leaving him helpless before the bigger child.

"Don't you ever hit me again!" Hunter threatened, "I don't even trust you now, stupid!" He added, in quite the childish manner. "Now I'm gonna punish you!"
1513311121.title: One-Sided Match

choices: Both boys begin to grow at a much more explosive rate
Their bodies start to develop as they grow, making them look like muscled teens
15133111212.content:
By now the house you were in - whatever house it actually was, you still weren't sure if it was a twisted version of your house or if it actually was Hunter's house like he had claimed - was about to fall apart. The interior walls had been mostly demolished by Hunter's most recent growth spurt, and Alex tackling him didn't help matters. You could hear the frame of the house groan as the huge boys crashed into the walls, and knew that you had to get out of there before things got worse.

"OOOOWWW!" Both Hunter and Alex cried out in pain. Alex fell back onto the bed, nearly crushing you.

"What did you just do, Alex?" Hunter cried out in anger. "That hurt like hell!!"

"I didn't do anything!" Alex spat back in reply. "My hand just brushed against your stupid key while we were fighting, and it burned me! Like really badly!" He was still wincing in discomfort.

"It burned me too," Hunter said, shaking his hand in an effort to relieve the pain. His anger began to transition into curiosity. "It's never done that before; it's always been a shock. I wonder what that means."

You weren't sure what was going on, but you knew you sure didn't want to stick around to find out. Tugging at your brother's ear, you begged him, "Alex, PLEASE! Let's get out of here!"

Alex nodded, picking you up and turning around, glaring at Hunter. "See ya later, 'Buddy'," he said to the taller boy, his voice dripping with sarcasm. In a flash, Alex burst forth with energy, heading straight to the wall while yelling, "AHHHHHHHHHH!!!!" You closed your eyes as Alex shielded you with his hands, pressed you close to his chest, and crashed through the wall, sending wood, glass, and insulation flying through the air.

He tucked and landed, rolling twice on the ground outside, then jumped up to his feet. Once he was a good 100 feet or so from the house, he turned around so the two of you could look at it and see the place that had been your prison for the past crazy night. Alex still held you close to his chest, and you could feel his heart beating rapidly.

From the outside you realized that the house looked nothing like yours or any one you had remembered seeing. It was painted a bright salmon pink color, the windows were all made of some weird opaque glass, and the walls seemed to intersect at all sorts of improper angles.

Of course, that last part was now mostly due to the house collapsing, as Hunter stretched his body up to its full height. His tank top and shorts had finally given up and ripped apart, leaving the giant boy naked, every inch of his thirty-foot-tall athletic-looking body completely visible for all to see.

You saw the giant close his eyes and cough as he tried to wave away the dust from the destruction of the house. Knowing you had to make the most of this chance, you pressed your hand into the skin of Alex's chest. "C'mon, bro, we've got to get out of here!!"

"Right," Alex said, turning to run down the street. Whatever neighborhood the two of you were now in seemed deserted, no one else anywhere in eyesight. Judging by the dark blue hue of the sky, though, it was probably very early morning, so that might explain the absence of other people.

As Alex got to the end of the block, he turned to look down both directions of the cross-street, trying to decide where to head towards now. From behind, you could see Hunter's massive figure begin to stomp down the street, pursuing the two of you in a slow but determined manner.

Your brother seemed to be taking an awfully long time to make up his mind on which way to go. "Alex! What's taking so long?" He didn't seek to hear you, his eyes almost glassy, looking like he was lost in a daze. Suddenly, his skin began to glow, and you could feel a strange heat begin to radiate from his body. His eyes opened up wide and his hand that was holding you began to shake.

"OHHHHHH, JUSTIN!" he cried out. "What's happening?! This feels so WEIRD!!!"

"I don't know," you answered, trying to hang on to Alex's thumb as best you could. "But I bet whatever it is has something to do with you being burnt by the key. Which means Hunter is probably going through the same thing." Looking back, you noticed that Hunter, too, seemed to be paused, and his body was glowing head to foot.

You had no idea of what to make of this incredibly odd turn of events, but decided to brace yourself for the worst. Nothing you could imagine, though, would be able to prepare you for what happened next.
15133111212.title: A Different Effect

choices: Hunter unlocks some new function in the key!
Is there anything at all in this place that can help?
151331112121.content:
Before you could even begin to catch your breath from all this insanity, Alex's body stopped glowing and the shaking came to a halt...only for his body to suddenly expand incredibly right in front of you! Before your very eyes, your once eleven foot tall brother suddenly rocketed up several feet, now as naked as Hunter, the thumb you'd been holding on to suddenly too thick to grab! You yelled in shock as the palm you were sitting on seemed to double, then triple, then quadruple in size, looking more and more like a field of human flesh. The rest of your once little brother's body was even more impressive! His massive chest stretched out in front of you like an insurmountable wall, heaving as Alex breathed heavily at the sudden changes. The arm your current perch was attached to seemed more like an ancient tree, thick and powerful. Even his face seemed more intimidating, despite being the visage clearly belonging to your brother. You couldn't see the rest of his body without moving to the edge of the palm and you weren't about to do that, now that you were sure you were much higher up than you had previously been!

Eventually, Alex's breathing returned to normal, his eyelids fluttering slightly before the orbs themselves focused in on you. They still looked a little glazed over after his growth spurt so you quickly got to your feet and waved your arms shouting, "Alex! I'm right here!"

Your voice no doubt barely reached his ears, but regardless, his eyes focused in on you. "J-Justin? That you?"

"Yes! Bring me up to your ear!"

Alex, somewhat shakily, did as you told him. Once his cave-like ear was near enough, you said, "This is insane!"

"I know!" Alex replied, rolling his eyes. "This whole thing has been insane!"

"Right...whatever!" you said. "Look, we've got to keep moving! Now!"

Alex giggled and said, "Why? I'm way bigger than Hunter now! Look!"

He moved his hand, lowering his fingers so you could see Hunter, still at the same height, but also still glowing and shaking. "See? He's no problem now!"

You did some quick math in your head. That burn from the key seemed to have made Alex about four times bigger than his previous eleven feet, making him about forty-four feet tall, give or take a few feet. If the same held true for Hunter, who had previously been thirty feet tall then...Oh crap!

"ALEX!" you shouted desperately, waving your arms at him again. "WE HAVE TO GET OUT OF HERE!"

"Huh? What are you--"

He was interrupted as Hunter suddenly surged upward in height, matching Alex's size in a few spurts before rocketing upward at an even greater speed, his naked body rearing into the sky like some kind of god. Alex's mouth dropped open as the gap in their size was suddenly widened again, dramatically. Falling back, your brother began to run away, stumbling slightly as the ground rumbled from Hunter's growth. Clocking in at one hundred and twenty feet tall, Hunter was now truly a force to be reckoned with, unlike any you had ever seen before. Judging by the grin on his face, he knew it too!

"Oh man...this key is AWESOME!" He thundered, his voice incredibly loud to your tiny ears. "I wonder if it has any other effects?"

He held the now truly tiny key in his palm, poking at it with his finger. For some odd reason, it wasn't giving him a shock of any kind like it had before. "Hmm... I wonder if it's stuck on burn now?"

As Hunter fiddled with the key, Alex desperately searched for a place to hide. All the houses in this neighborhood appeared to be the same, all pink colored two story houses set in little groups, connected by streets that didn't seem to have a definite beginning or end. It was almost like being caught in something akin to an M.C. Escher painting, an impossible landscape that only led in circles. Luckily for you, you weren't truly going around in circles, and Hunter wasn't attempting to come after you...yet!

"Bro... what are we going to do?" Alex asked, looking a bit worried. His animosity toward you had apparently been set aside for now. That was one lucky break for you, at least.

"I don't know...we've got to find a place to hide!"

"Right! Hide...Where?"

Before you could answer, Alex skidded to a halt in front of one of the houses. You were about to question him on this when he merely pointed. Looking down, getting a slight sense of vertigo, you noticed that the door to the house was open. You noticed at every other house you had passed that the doors were all closed. Why was this one in particular open?

Alex suddenly set you down as carefully as he could onto the door step of the house. You looked up at him with a confused look on your face. "Go in! Maybe there's something in there to help us!"

You sighed and looked at the door. Oddly enough, the door frame was half your size! The house had more in common with a playhouse than an actual house. The oddities of this world never ceased, it seemed. Getting down on your hands and knees, you barely manage to squeeze into the tiny house which was, once again, a replica of your own, just in miniature now. Hoping against hope, you began to search as best you could, looking for something, ANYTHING that could help you!
151331112121.title: Big Trouble Just Got Bigger!

choices: Alex is hit and explodes with size!
Alex knocks Hunter off of him, and you accidentally shoot Hunter instead!
1513311121212.content:
It was a tight squeeze. At this moment, you couldn't help but think another zap from that key would make navigating this tiny place a little easier, but that thought was knocked out of you as you realized how stupid you were. The smaller you got, the more danger you'd be in, and the more likely it was that you'd get crushed! And dying wasn't exactly on your list of "to-do's." As fast as you could, you dashed up to your room to see if something could help. You figured it was probably just as you had left it, but in this bizarre world, maybe there was something that could help!

As Alex was waiting outside, focused on you and the tiny house, he hadn't even noticed that Hunter had snuck up behind him! "There you are, you stupid punk!" he said, using the bottom of his foot to push Alex over. Your brother fell down with a thud, shaking the house as you were in it!

"Go away!" Alex barked at him, "I don't want to see you again!"

"Shut up! I'm bigger than you, and I can do whatever I want!" Hunter replied. He stomped his foot down on Alex's chest, grinning all the while. "You're just a little runt now!" Hunter's body had developed into that of an athletic teen, his chest laying comfortably above a set of six-pack abs. His legs were strong and taut, with powerful arms that could no doubt crush a house (or several)! Alex let out a whimper, but he wasn't about to take it lying down! He tried to swipe at Hunter's ankle, but only ended up hurting himself! Alex let out a pained groan as he held his foot, all while Hunter just let out a triumphant laugh. "You can't hurt me! I'm at least three times your size!" he boasted.

All the while, you could hear their conversation from inside the tiny house. Your room was useless. Nothing there could help you. You tried searching your parents' room, the bathroom, the living room-- nothing! Everywhere you went lit a spark of hope only to have it extinguished when you found out nothing was there! Everything seemed to be exactly as you remember it. Your shoulders began to chafe as they kept getting rubbed up against the walls. The sensation just reminded you of how badly you wanted to hurry up and get out of there!

Reaching the kitchen, the last room left to search, you immediately noticed something strange on the counter, almost as if someone WANTED you to find it. Walking over, you realized it was a ray gun! It appeared to have a knob with two settings, one with an icon of a large person, and another of a small person. It didn't take a rocket scientist to figure out what they meant! Realizing this was just the thing that could help, you reached out and grabbed it. However, as soon as you touched the gun, it expanded! It went from being a pistol size to almost the size of a bazooka! This could complicate things a bit, you thought. However, at this point, there wasn't much of a choice! With the gun in tow, you did your best to get out of the house as fast as you could.

Just making it out of the door, glad to finally be out of that cramped space, you immediately saw Hunter picking on Alex! He had him pinned down, and a loogie dangled from his lips, right above Alex's face! Hunter slurped it up a little, only to then let it drop a little closer! It upset you to the point of being borderline furious! No one, not even you, treated Alex that bad! Some sort of protective brotherly instinct kicked in as you turned set the gun to enlarge, and aimed it at Alex...
1513311121212.title: A Glimmer of Hope!

choices: He hears you and comes stomping after you in rescue.
He's too busy with his new giant body, and Hunter has you (& the gun) to himself
15133111212121.content:
You lined up the sights, Alex in the crosshairs of the bazooka. He was squirming around, trying to get Hunter off of him, but the boy was three times your brother's size; he didn't stand a chance. "Not without my help," you said to yourself.

As you squeezed the trigger, a bolt of electricity shot out of the barrel of the gun, making a loud cracking noise and zipping through the air. The kickback from the gun sent you flying back into the miniature house, your back slamming against its wall. You managed to keep your eyes open, seeing the bolt hit your brother on the side of his face and immediately dissolve into his skin.

"OWWWWW!" Alex yelled in pain. "Where the heck did that lightning come from? It's not cloudy at all!"

"What's that, shrimp?" Hunter asked, not having noticed the ray hit Alex. "I can't hear you from all the way down there!"

As you stood up and brushed yourself off, though, you noticed that Hunter had suddenly started to look around frantically. "Where is it?!" he cried out. His brow furrowed as he looked down at Alex. "What did you do with it, punk? Did you take it?!"

"Take what?" your brother asked. By the look on his face he honestly had no idea what Hunter was asking him.

"You know what, dumb ass! The key!" You felt a sense of hope inside as you realize that somehow Hunter had lost track of the thing that had made him grow. Maybe he dropped it; maybe it disappeared somehow when the gun got fired. Either way, the tables were beginning to turn.

"Alex!" you called out to your brother, wondering why the blast of the ray hadn't started to change him yet. "How do you feel? Are you okay?"

He thought for a moment. "You mean except for having my former friend now crushing me and trying to humiliate me? I'm just great. In fact--"

Your brother stopped talking as his entire body started to shake. He felt it. On top of him, Hunter felt it. Even you felt it, standing a ways back from him. "OHHHHh..." he moaned, his eyes rolling into the back of his head.

"Oh, crap," Hunter exclaimed as he quickly stood up, starting to back away. He couldn't move very far though before Alex's body began to surge with growth, every part of him becoming larger and more powerful. His feet pushed against the side of the house you stood in front of, and you jumped out of the way to avoid it's destruction.

"Justin, this feels GREAT!" Alex exclaimed. With Hunter no longer on top of him, he sat up, and you quickly realized just how big your brother was getting. Even without standing, his head towered high above the houses in the neighborhood, becoming much bigger than Hunter and still going. He seemed to be enjoying it, and you noticed his uncovered cock happened to be completely erect and sticking straight out, very impressive even compared to the rest of his body. And while Hunter's muscles looked like those of a very athletic older teen, Alex's swelled out even further, giving him the appearance of a professional bodybuilder. Hills of rock-hard muscle sprung up along his chest and abs, and valleys formed in between his pecs. He had already been a giant; now he was becoming a true titan. You made a mental note to stay on his good side from now on.

"Ahh, that's better!" Alex said as his growth slowed to a stop. He leaned back, his massive backside crushing a pair of houses next to each other, and his legs stretching across the street. With a mischievous smile on his face, he powered his foot entirely through a large house, demolishing it with a single powerful kick. "Let's see anyone try to get the best of me now!" It would be an impressive accomplishment; the next biggest thing out there, Hunter, was now less than a third of his size.

You smiled with cautious optimism as you watched your brother get used to his new size. As you did, however, you felt long fingers wrap around you, and your body was being lifted into the air. Looking up, you saw that Hunter had grasped you in his hand, and was running as far away as he could get from Alex. Shocked, you screamed out, hoping your brother could hear you. "Wait-- Alex! HELP! HELP ME!!!"
15133111212121.title: Back and Forth

choices: Alex asks Justin what that white stuff was.
Alex and Hunter decide that they really liked that and try to experiment more.
